title: The number 1 reason preventing most small businesses from generating more sales from their website.
body:
## **7 additional Reasons Clients love the websites we build**  

1. **It's fast** — Each site is built for speed and security first. Remember that no matter how great your message or the promotion you run it must be seen to make customers take action and buy.  Our websites and Content delivery network is built to fully load in less than 2 .5 seconds.    
2. **Progressive Web App** ([PWA](https://developers.google.com/web/progressive-web-apps/)) — The site saves its CSS/JS/HTML and image assets for faster loading, a more reliable offline experience, and the ability to be installed on Android home screens. 
3. **High Octane Web Site Performance**  1. The average load time is 1.25 seconds according to regular test on webpagetest.org. Our site maintains a perfect 100 score according to tests performed on Google Lighthouse.
4. **Responsive** — The website layout resizes to fit any device display using CSS grid.
5. **Built-in Search** — find any blog posts with ease. The live search finds misspelled words and instantly updates its results as you type.
6. **OurFavoriteStack** — Better performance, more economical hosting, and higher security are three of the benefits built into every website we build. 
7. **Minimalist design** — Functional, Fast and Ad free, Pop Up Free, Bot Free. Our answer to the many distracting website add-ons that annoy users. trends in web design today.
